title: Study after a Funeral Monument and Study after Frieze
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Brandegee, Boston.
description: Study of funeral monument with personification of poetry, urn and dog; frieze of base of funeral monument; study of funeral monument with female figure and dog.
name: Drawing
